net.flybyte.virgo
Class BaseMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      net.flybyte.virgo.BaseMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
Deploy, ImmediateShutdown, Refresh, RefreshBundle, Shutdown, Start, Undeploy
public abstract class BaseMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

This class acts as a base class used to initialize all the parameters and configuration settings needed for executing the various mojo implementations.

Author:
Frieder Heugel

getArtefactFile

public File getArtefactFile()
This method identifies the complete path of the artefact (including its extension) and returns a file object. ${project.build.finalName} doesn't provide the extension and therefore this method is needed.

Returns:
